ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks, everyone who is congratulating me.  Dunno why, it s just another number to me.  :) ... Naw, I ve been really careful every since 46.  About half my
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Mar 2000, Webber, Jessica wrote:
> > From: <kim@...>
> >
> > Doh. I hit 50 this weekend.
>
> Congrats!!

Thanks, everyone who is congratulating me. Dunno why, it's
just another number to me. :)

> (I'm almost afraid to ask, but, is this your first time hitting 50? I could
> have sworn you'd gotten it already but didn't want to rub it in if you'd
> lost the level)

Naw, I've been really careful every since 46. About half my
deaths since then were to death touches. Most of the rest
were to trains where everyone died. I've started scouting the
area while invis before I enter/pull/fight, using sneak/hide a
lot, and pre-planning battle plans and escape tactics. It
seems to have made a difference.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
